item.title: MIUI V12.0.3.0.RKQEUXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Lite 4G EEA

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to February 2021. Increased system security.
[Other]

Fix: Fingerprints couldn't be recorded in some cases
Fix: Wi-Fi connection drained battery in some cases
